-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Generator modules for planning exams
--   
--   See README at <a>https://github.com/obcode/plexams#readme</a>
@package plexams-generators
@version 1.1.0.0

module Plexams.Generators.Invigilation
generateInvigilations :: Plan -> [AddInvigilatorToRoomOrSlot]
generateInvigilations' :: Plan -> Writer [AddInvigilatorToRoomOrSlot] Plan
generateInvigilationsForOwnExams :: Plan -> Writer [AddInvigilatorToRoomOrSlot] Plan
addMinutesPlannedToInvigilator :: Plan -> PersonID -> Duration -> Plan
invigilationIsPossible :: Invigilator -> Exam -> Bool
generateInvigilationsForOwnExams' :: Plan -> PersonID -> Writer [AddInvigilatorToRoomOrSlot] Plan

module Plexams.Generators.Rooms
generateRooms :: Plan -> [AddRoomToExam]

module Plexams.Generators.Schedule
generateSchedule :: Plan -> (Plan, [AddExamToSlot])

-- | Schedule exams with same name in the same slot.
--   
--   This only works if one of them is already planned. Ignores exams with
--   same name that are planned in different slots.
scheduleExamsWithSameName :: Plan -> (Plan, [AddExamToSlot])
